ygData.subject: Re: Ok everyone, WAKE UP
ygData.msgSnippet: About Soulfire, the quest continues.  I am working with a few groups to acquire this hilt on the Cazic-Thule server.  We are still looking for Bog Juice...
ygData.messageBody:
About Soulfire, the quest continues. I am working with a few groups to acquire
this hilt on the Cazic-Thule server. We are still looking for Bog Juice...
Sounds disgusting to me. I would buy Zimel a whole barrel of Elven Wine if it
would help.

About Ghoulsbane, I still think it is a quest sword but the quest is so broken
no one even knows where it starts. I don't like the idea of killing another
Paladin to get Ghoulsbane, but what else can we do? I do not have a Holy Sword
of any kind, but a day will come when I will have to make the decision.

I am still trying to collect information on Brilliant Sword of Faith. It looks
like that quest is still broken. What gets me is the fact that it WORKED at
one point, and then they broke it.


> From: "CybrWzrd" <CybrWzrd@...>
>
> This newsgroup has been kind of slow lately, and I am wondering what
> everyones thoughts on geting ghoulsbane are, because you do have to kill a
> fellow paladin to get it. Also has anyone here found any other piecec of
> soulfire other than the hilt that is on the shadowknight in Mistmoore? Just
> a few new topics to hopefully breathe some life into this group.
>
> Lady Dame Laurana Highwind

--
-Sir Vawhn, Knight of Truth, Silver
Cazic-Thule server
